coverage_details.accommodation: Standard Suite; Single/private Room at IMC and Dr. Suleiman Habib Medical centers; Max Room & Board per person per day for Class-VIP at Dr. Suleiman Habib and Saad Specialist Hospital is private rooms.
coverage_details.bone_marrow_transplant: Up to 3 cases per policy period; sublimit not directly stated above, but see special instructions
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered: Heart, liver, kidney only. Medication limit equal to pre-auth approval.
coverage_details.dental_general: Dental benefit covers consultation, simple & surgical extractions, antibiotics, root canal treatment, fillings, X-rays (small and panoramic as approved during policy period), appropriate medication up to benefit sub-limit. Dental Scaling and pulpotomy is covered.
coverage_details.congenital: Covered up to annual limit. Also, congenital diseases/deformities covered for all beneficiaries subject to aggregate policy limit SR 150,000.00.
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Up to SR 300.00 for newborn baby girls
coverage_details.disability_cases: SR 100,000.00; Disability cases covered up to benefits sub-limit according to CCHI regulations.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for in/outpatient services except services with specific limits (incl. dental, hearing aids, kidney dialysis, optical, maternity). Medication preauth limit SR 1,000,000.00.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Developmental cases covered. Allergy illness covered. Diabetes Insulin Pump covered (child <8 years, adults >60 with memory/Alzheimer’s). Parents/collaterals covered, max 200 members. 5 post-IVF treatment cases covered per policy. In-house clinics medicine SR 500,000 annual limit (at Savola’s 3 clinics: Afia International, United Sugar, Panda). Knee replacement post-trauma covered. If service unavailable in-network, Bupa arranges alternative. Road Traffic Accident covered per CCHI. Newborns covered from birth. Congenital defects/birth defects for newborns to policy max. Developmental, psoriasis and isolation-required conditions covered.
